episodes.title: LDS Prophets—Why Their Teachings Matter (In Their Own Words)
episodes.description:
Why do ex-Mormons share the words of the leaders when talking about their religious trauma and deconstruction? Because THEY TOLD US THEY WERE SPEAKING FOR GOD. You can't decide the prophets' words no longer hold any weight just when it is inconvenient or embarrassing for you. The men who lead this church ARE this church.
